DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the safety and efficacy of FID 114657 in comparison to Soothe XP in a specified population of dry eye patients.
DOC.brief_title: An Evaluation of the Safety and Efficacy of FID 114657
DOC.criteria: Documented diagnosis of dry eye NaFl Corneal Staining sum score â‰¥ 3 in either eye Must not have worn contact lenses for 1 week preceding enrollment
